other_tests.findings: Severe restrictive ventilatory defect and decreased diffusing capacity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient's respiratory status declined precipitously; died of treatment-refractory hypoxemia.

other_tests.findings: Bone marrow was moderately hypocellular (30% cellularity).
Confirmed a heterozygous mutation in TERT, c:2768Câ†’T, causing a substitution of leucine for proline at amino acid 923.
Confirmed severe, diffuse pulmonary fibrosis with honeycomb changes at the lung bases.
